about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Nanavati Ventures Limited is a Diamond Trading company. The company sells diamonds largely to a domestic customer base that includes jewellery manufacturers, large department store chains, retail stores, and wholesalers. The company is located in Surat, Gujarat.

Nanavati Ventures purchases rough and unpolished diamonds from suppliers, and then professional workers process and polish those rough gemstones for the end product. The company's products are sold and distributed through independent sales and distribution networks.

Competitive Strengths.

  • The established brand.
  • Management and Employee expertise.
  • Understand Customer Needs.
  • Existing distribution and sales networks in the domestic market and our geographical benefit.
  • Quality products.

faqs.question: What is the Nanavati Ventures IPO?
faqs.answer:
Nanavati Ventures IPO is a SME IPO of 436000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.18 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹50 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on April 25, 2022, and closes on April 27, 2022.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Nanavati Ventures IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Nanavati Ventures IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Nanavati Ventures IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Nanavati Ventures IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Nanavati Ventures IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Nanavati Ventures IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Nanavati Ventures IPO opens on April 25, 2022 and closes on April 27, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Nanavati Ventures IPO?
faqs.answer: Nanavati Ventures IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,50,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Nanavati Ventures IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Nanavati Ventures IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Nanavati Ventures IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Nanavati Ventures IPO will be done on Monday, May 2, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, May 5, 2022. Check the Nanavati Ventures IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Nanavati Ventures IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Nanavati Ventures IPO listing date is on Friday, May 6, 2022.
